Name: Hardworking Hero
About the game: Adventurer! Money is everything, working hard and earning money! Explore the map randomly in the lost world. Random map events waiting to be resolved! Work hard to make coins, and develop your character. Facing powerful mobs! Failure is the mother of success. Use gold to upgrade your character. Collect materials to upgrade equipment! Create buildings to earn more money Is the income increase too slow? You need more buildings! Save the villagers and they'll join your team. Lost villagers are waiting for you to give them a home.
